column3: @jnewbery Mind doing a rebase on master, since the last travis run (https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/builds/373612454) was about two months ago.

Rebased on master. I can no longer repro the OOM locally (tried running the test 100 times), and Travis passes. @MarcoFalke - can you try running this locally?\n\nI'm removing the **[Do not merge]** tag, since if this runs reliably it's ready for merge.
@jnewbery Good to hear your tested ack on  0882406 ;)
Concept ACK 38040c34e1e71ee4b6b56a018f742c8b03546b75\n\nGoing to take a closer look later
